about.name: engpron
about.caption: Helps to type the pronunciation of English words. Uses tipa.sty.

description.abstract: This package provides macros beginning with the £ (pound) character, made active, which enable us to write the British or America English pronunciation as one can find it in the ``English Pronouncing Dictionary'' by Daniel Jones. There is an option to typeset the pronunciation in the style of the Harrap's.
